answers.answer: Hey i failed the 1st one with my son bc i ate all day my test wasnt until 4om and had to go back for the 3hr. Do yourself a favor go 1st thing in the morning do not eat or drink after 9pm the night before and you should do fine. You get the results in 24 hrs.
I should add i am on baby #2 a girl and i went for my test this time at 8am didnt eat or drink (only water) after 9pm I passed
